author: markt

author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: ctest runs all tests in the build tree, added valgrind support.
Updated README with info on running tests.
Wrapper script tests/run.py to run tests, allows ctest to run with no environment settings.
System tests also run by ctest in the build tree.
Valgrind support added, OFF by default: many memory errors, slows down system tests.
Note: test.sh behaves as before, it runs unit tests in the build and system tests in the install tree.
